text: Logon mein jo tafraqa(ikhtilaf) runuma hua woh iske baad hua ke unke paas ilm aa chuka tha aur is bina par hua ke woh aapas mein ek dusre par zyadati karna chahte thay. Agar tera Rubb pehle hi yeh na farma chuka hota ke ek waqt e muqarrar tak faisla multawi rakkha jayega to inka qaziya chuka diya gaya hota. Aur haqeeqat yeh hai ke aglon ke baad jo log kitab ke waaris banaye gaye woh uski taraf se badey istarab angez shakk mein padey huey hain
